name: trace
effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it copies a random opponent's ability. This ability cannot copy flower gift, forecast, illusion, imposter, multitype, trace, wonder guard, or zen mode.
short_effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
